forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 13C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 54F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 46F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
